com.moomoohk.Grame.Core

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Grids are the backbone of Grame. They serve as the map in which objects move around and interact with each other.
    Since:
    2013-04-05
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID

        public final int ID
        The ID of this Grid.

        This ID is unique and cannot be changed.
        It is this Grid's place in the GrameManager's list of Grids.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Ticks the Grid.

        Users will never need to call this method (The GrameManager takes care of ticking everything).

      • calcColor

        private java.awt.Color calcColor(Coordinates pos)
        Calculates the color of a square gridd on the objects that are occupying it.
        Parameters:
        pos - Set of Coordinates to calculate the color of.
        Returns:
        The color at the Coordinates.

      • getGrameObject

                                  int layer)
        Gets the GrameManager at given Coordinates in a certain layer.
        Parameters:
        pos - The Coordinates to get the object from.
        layer - The layer to get the object from.
        Returns:
        The GrameManager at the given Coordinates in the given layer.

      • getGrameObjectPos

        public Coordinates getGrameObjectPos(int goID)
        Returns the position of a GrameObject that is in this Grid.
        Parameters:
        goID - GrameObject.ID of the GrameObject.
        Returns:
        Coordinates of the GrameObject. If it is not found null will be returned.

      • getGrameObjectLayer

        public GrameObjectLayer getGrameObjectLayer()
        Returns the default GrameObjectLayer of this Grid.
        Returns:
        The default GrameObjectLayer of this Grid.

      • moveGrameObject

        public void moveGrameObject(int goID,
                            Coordinates pos)
        Moves a GrameObject from its current position to a new position on the same layer.

        If the new position already contains a collidable GrameObject it will be consumed by the GrameObject that is being moved there.

        Parameters:
        goID - The GrameObject.ID of the GrameObject to move.
        pos - Coordinates to which the object should move.

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied(Coordinates pos)
        Checks whether a set of Coordinates is occupied on the default layer.
        Parameters:
        pos - Coordinates to check.
        Returns:
        True if the Coordinates are occupied on the default layer, else false.
        See Also:
        isOccupied(Coordinates, int)

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied(Coordinates pos,
                          int layer)
        Checks whether a set of Coordinates is occupied on a specified layer.
        Parameters:
        pos - Coordinates to check.
        layer - Layer to check.
        Returns:
        True if the Coordinates are occupied on the specified layer, else false.

      • setWraparound

        public void setWraparound(boolean f)
        Sets the "wraparound" aspect of this Grid.

        "Wraparound" means that if a GrameObject tries to go off one side of this Grid it will be placed on the other side.
        Think of Snake and Pac-Man.

        Parameters:
        f - True for wraparound, else false.

      • getWraparound

        public boolean getWraparound()
        Gets the "wraparound" aspect of this Grid.

        "Wraparound" means that if a GrameObject tries to go off one side of this Grid it will be placed on the other side.
        Think of Snake and Pac-Man.

        Returns:
        True if this Grid is a wraparound Grid, else false.

      • getDiagonal

        public int getDiagonal()
        Returns the length of the diagonal of this Grid.
        Returns:
        The length of the diagonal of this Grid.

        Parameters:
